text: Tyancya janasamuhacya kaphira saradaranni uttara dile ki amhi tara tumhala apalyacasarakhe manusya asalyace pahato ani tumacya anuyayinnahi pahato ki spastatah khalacya patalicya lokankherija dusara koni nahi. (Je tumace anusarana karita aheta) amhala tara tumhi konatyahi prakare amacyapeksa srestha disata nahi, ulata amhi tara tumhala khote samajato
